feed.title: Track Awesome Clojurescript Updates Daily
feed.subtitle: A community driven list of ClojureScript frameworks, libraries and wrappers.

entry.title: Awesome Clojurescript Updates on Jul 04, 2022
entry.content:
Resources / Books

  • ClojureScript Unraveled (2nd edition) – An open source book about the ClojureScript language that covers all the language features, how to use the compiler and the tooling for building applications and libraries.

entry.title: Awesome Clojurescript Updates on Aug 23, 2021
entry.content:
Resources / Books

  • Clojure, The Essential Reference – A reference book on the Clojure language and standard library.

entry.title: Awesome Clojurescript Updates on May 05, 2021
entry.content:
Awesome ClojureScript / React.js Interface

  • Helix (⭐650) – A simple, easy to use library for React development in ClojureScript with very few semantics on top of React.
  • hx (⭐246) – Another simple, easy to use library for React development in ClojureScript.

entry.title: Awesome Clojurescript Updates on Sep 24, 2019
entry.content:
Resources / Books

  • ClojureScript Unraveled – An open source book about the ClojureScript language that covers all the language features, how to use the compiler and the tooling for building applications and libraries.
  • ClojureScript: Up and Running – An introduction to ClojureScript written by big guns of Clojure Stuart Sierra and Luke VanderHart.
  • Etudes for ClojureScript – A hands-on-book of 30 companion exercises or études for introducing ClojureScript.
  • Learning ClojureScript – Master the art of agile single page web application development with ClojureScript.
  • Transforming Data with ClojureScript – A beginner's guide to ClojureScript with interactive examples and exercises, "focusing on the main task that programming does—transforming data".

Resources / Courses

  • ClojureScript Koans – A great way to start learning Clojure and ClojureScript on the web with interactive challanges.
  • Lambda Island – A full-stack web development course including front-end with ClojureScript, back-end with Clojure, language essentials, security, internet standards and system administration.
  • Learn Reagent – An introduction to ClojureScript with Reagent for developers. 1 hour free content is available. learn re-frame is its follow up.
  • Learning ClojureScript – A 2h 11m long introduction to Clojurescript by O'Really Online Learning. Also available on Udemy.

Resources / Videos

  • ClojureScript for Skeptics – Derek Slager's talk for Clojure Conj 2015 where he is Discussing the many reasons why ClojureScript is in fact a very pragmatic language to consider for web development.
  • Interactive programming Flappy Bird in ClojureScript – A 5 minutes video from 2014 demostrating the power of ClojureScript's developer experience.

Awesome ClojureScript / Code Analysis

  • kibit (⭐1.8k) – Static code analyzer to find patterns of code that could be rewritten with a more idiomatic function or macro.

Awesome ClojureScript / Development

  • Ambly (⭐539) – A ClojureScript REPL into iOS JavaScriptCore.
  • Instaparse (⭐89) – It aims to be the simplest way to build parsers in ClojureScript.
  • lein-cljsbuild (⭐1.1k) – A Leiningen plugin to make ClojureScript development easy.
  • shadow-cljs (⭐2.3k) – ClojureScript compilation made easy
  • Truss (⭐322) – An opinionated assertions API for Clojure/ClojureScript.

Awesome ClojureScript / Document Object Model

  • Respo (⭐234) – A responsive DOM library, inspired by React.

Awesome ClojureScript / Internationalization

  • Tempura (⭐263) – A Clojure(Script) i18n library, succeeding Tower

Awesome ClojureScript / React.js Interface

  • cljsx (⭐14) – JSX for Clojure and ClojureScript, also works with Inferno, Nerv, Preact, Snabbdome (⭐12k) and others.
  • Om (⭐6.6k) – A powerful interface to React, makes use of its object oriented structures.
  • Quiescent (⭐610) – It favors functional style, fully stateless.
  • Reagent – Minimalistic, feature complete.
  • Rum (⭐1.8k) – Decomplected, extensible, simple.

Awesome ClojureScript / Reactive Programming

  • Manifold-cljs (⭐49) – A port of Manifold (⭐1k) to ClojureScript.

Awesome ClojureScript / Web Framework & Template

  • Fulcro – A library for development of single-page full-stack web applications in clj/cljs.
  • Mr-Clean – A reagent compatible library without react.js dependency.
  • Precept (⭐660) – A declarative programming framework.

entry.title: Awesome Clojurescript Updates on Apr 12, 2019
entry.content:
Awesome ClojureScript / Graphics

  • Quil (⭐3k) – A processing and graphics programming library.

entry.title: Awesome Clojurescript Updates on Dec 28, 2018
entry.content:
Awesome ClojureScript / Validation

  • form-validator-cljs (⭐55) – Validate forms with spec and fn.

entry.title: Awesome Clojurescript Updates on Sep 21, 2018
entry.content:
Awesome ClojureScript / Testing

  • cljs.test (⭐9.3k) – Integrated test framework for ClojureScript (merged from clojurescript.test (⭐164))

entry.title: Awesome Clojurescript Updates on Aug 25, 2018
entry.content:
Awesome ClojureScript / Database

  • specql (⭐131) – Library for simple PostgreSQL queries with namespaced keys.

Awesome ClojureScript / CSS tools

  • Garden (⭐1.4k) – A library for rendering CSS in Clojure and ClojureScript.
  • stylefy (⭐319) – stylefy makes it possible to define UI component styles as Clojure data and attach them into components easily without writing CSS selectors

Awesome ClojureScript / Miscellaneous

  • namespacefy (⭐21) – A simple Clojure(Script) library which aims to make it easy to keep map keys namespaced, no matter where your data comes from.

Awesome ClojureScript / State Management

  • Tuck (⭐29) – A micro framework for building Reagent apps that have a clean separation of view code and event processing code.

entry.title: Awesome Clojurescript Updates on Jun 08, 2018
entry.content:
Awesome ClojureScript / Client/Server Communication

  • cljs-ajax (⭐673) – A simple Ajax client for ClojureScript and Clojure.

entry.title: Awesome Clojurescript Updates on Jun 16, 2017
entry.content:
Awesome ClojureScript / Development

  • Lumo (⭐1.9k) – Fast, cross-platform, standalone ClojureScript environment.

entry.title: Awesome Clojurescript Updates on May 31, 2017
entry.content:
Awesome ClojureScript / Web Framework & Template

  • Keechma – Micro frontend framework for ClojureScript and Reagent.

entry.title: Awesome Clojurescript Updates on Mar 20, 2017
entry.content:
Awesome ClojureScript / Canvas

  • Quamolit (⭐5) – A tiny declarative animation library , inspired by React.

Awesome ClojureScript / Data Serialization

  • Cljson (⭐62) – Clojure/ClojureScript library for accelerated browser data deserialization.
  • Transit (⭐323) – A data interchange format and set of libraries for conveying values between applications written in different programming languages.

Awesome ClojureScript / Database

  • Konserve (⭐304) – A clojuresque key-value/document store protocol with core.async.

Awesome ClojureScript / Development

  • cljs-devtools (⭐1.1k) – Better presentation of ClojureScript values in Chrome Devtools.
  • lein-figwheel (⭐2.9k) – Leiningen plugin that pushes ClojureScript code changes to the client.

Awesome ClojureScript / Document Object Model

  • Crate (⭐220) – A ClojureScript implementation of Hiccup.
  • Dommy (⭐757) – A no-nonsense ClojureScript templating and DOM manipulation library.
  • Kioo (⭐404) – DOM manipulation and templating library for Facebook's React and Om in ClojureScript.
  • Sablono (⭐694) – Lisp/Hiccup style templating for Facebook's React in ClojureScript.

Awesome ClojureScript / Graphics

  • geom (⭐970) – A 2D/3D geometry toolkit for Clojure/Clojurescript.

Awesome ClojureScript / Miscellaneous

  • Keybind (⭐85) – Library for handling key bindings (shortcuts) in browser.
  • markdown-clj (⭐560) – Markdown parser in Clojure/ClojureScript.
  • reforms (⭐168) – Beautiful Bootstrap 3 forms for Om and Reagent.
  • Sepal.clj (⭐31) – A library to generate Clojure code from a vector of strings and vectors with macro system.

Awesome ClojureScript / React.js Interface

  • re-com (⭐815) – A ClojureScript library of reusable components for Reagent.

Awesome ClojureScript / State Management

  • plato (⭐30) – Incrementally persists atom state to Local Storage in ClojureScript.
  • storage-atom (⭐192) – ClojureScript atoms backed by HTML5 web storage.

Awesome ClojureScript / Web Framework & Template

  • Chestnut (⭐1.3k) – An Application template for ClojureScript/Om with live reloading.
  • descjop (⭐394) – A template for Web based desktop application with Electron.
  • electron-template (⭐116) – A template for creating web based desktop applications with Electron, ClojureScript and Reagent.
  • WebFUI (⭐236) – Client-Side Web Framework for ClojureScript.

entry.title: Awesome Clojurescript Updates on Mar 07, 2017
entry.content:
Awesome ClojureScript / Development

  • Devcards (⭐1.5k) – Devcards aims to provide a visual REPL experience for ClojureScript.
  • Planck (⭐1k) – A stand-alone ClojureScript REPL for macOS and Linux based on JavaScriptCore.
  • Ribol – Conditional restarts for clojure/clojurescript.

Awesome ClojureScript / WebSockets

  • Chord (⭐439) – Designed to bridge the gap between the triad of CLJ/CLJS, web-sockets and core.async.
  • Sente (⭐1.8k) – Clojure(Script) + core.async + WebSockets/Ajax.

entry.title: Awesome Clojurescript Updates on Mar 05, 2017
entry.content:
Awesome ClojureScript / Routing

  • Router (⭐80) – Bidirectional Ring router for Clojure/Script. REST oriented.
  • Secretary (⭐771) – A client-side router for ClojureScript.

entry.title: Awesome Clojurescript Updates on Feb 16, 2017
entry.content:
Awesome ClojureScript / Documentation

  • codox (⭐673) – A tool for generating API documentation from Clojure or ClojureScript source code.

entry.title: Awesome Clojurescript Updates on Feb 09, 2017
entry.content:
Awesome ClojureScript / State Management

  • component (⭐2.1k) – Managed lifecycle of stateful objects in Clojure(Script).
  • mount (⭐1.2k) – A beautifl idiomatic state management library.

entry.title: Awesome Clojurescript Updates on Jan 14, 2017
entry.content:
Awesome ClojureScript / Web Framework & Template

  • Macchiato (⭐380) – It aims to provide an easy to use platform for Node.js.

entry.content:
Awesome ClojureScript / JavaScript Interoperability

  • Purnam – A ClojureScript library designed to provide better clojurescript/javascript interop, testing and documentation tools.

entry.content:
Awesome ClojureScript / Client/Server Communication

  • Fetch (⭐207) – A ClojureScript library that makes client/server interaction painless.

entry.content:
Awesome ClojureScript / Miscellaneous

  • reagent-forms (⭐339) – Bootstrap form components for Reagent.

entry.title: Awesome Clojurescript Updates on Jan 20, 2016
entry.content:
Awesome ClojureScript / Miscellaneous

  • om-tools (⭐433) – It aims to provide higher-order abstractions and utilities frequently useful when building components with Om's API.

entry.title: Awesome Clojurescript Updates on Jan 08, 2016
entry.content:
Awesome ClojureScript / Web Framework & Template

  • Clops (⭐175) – An opinionated, full stack and easy to use web framework.

entry.title: Awesome Clojurescript Updates on Dec 23, 2015
entry.content:
Awesome ClojureScript / Document Object Model

  • Dominator (⭐73) – Virtual-Dom in ClojureScript.
  • Enfocus – A DOM manipulation and templating library for ClojureScript inspired by Enlive.
  • Freactive (⭐386) – A high-performance, pure Clojurescript, declarative DOM library inspired by reagent, om, reflex and hiccup.
  • json-html (⭐163) – Provide JSON and get a DOM node with a human representation of that JSON.

entry.title: Awesome Clojurescript Updates on Nov 13, 2015
entry.content:
Awesome ClojureScript / HTTP Handler

  • Castra (⭐172) – An HTTP remote procedure call handler for Clojure.

Awesome ClojureScript / Reactive Programming

  • Javelin (⭐811) – A Functional Reactive Programming library for ClojureScript.

Awesome ClojureScript / State Management

  • hodgepodge – A idiomatic ClojureScript interface to HTML5 Storage.

entry.title: Awesome Clojurescript Updates on Oct 09, 2015
entry.content:
Awesome ClojureScript / Miscellaneous

  • Bardo (⭐94) – A Clojure(Script) library for functional interpolation and transitions.

Awesome ClojureScript / Routing

  • Bidi (⭐996) – A Clojure(script) data driven routing library.

entry.title: Awesome Clojurescript Updates on Oct 07, 2015
entry.content:
Awesome ClojureScript / Testing

  • test.check (⭐1.1k) – A generative property-based testing tool inspired by QuickCheck.

Awesome ClojureScript / Web Framework & Template

  • Tenzing – A ClojureScript template with no backend that uses Boot.

entry.title: Awesome Clojurescript Updates on May 26, 2015
entry.content:
Awesome ClojureScript / React.js Interface

  • Brutha (⭐139) – A simple and functional ClojureScript interface to React.

Awesome ClojureScript / Reactive Programming

  • Reagi (⭐230) – An FRP library for Clojure and ClojureScript, built on top of core.async.

entry.title: Awesome Clojurescript Updates on May 25, 2015
entry.content:
Awesome ClojureScript / Miscellaneous

  • Entanglement (⭐43) – It creates atoms from other atoms and links the data together.

entry.title: Awesome Clojurescript Updates on May 23, 2015
entry.content:
Awesome ClojureScript / Reactive Programming

  • rx-cljs (⭐44) – A ClojureScript wrapper for Reactive Extensions (Rx) for Javascript.
  • Yolk – A thin ClojureScript wrapper around bacon.js.

entry.title: Awesome Clojurescript Updates on May 21, 2015
entry.content:
Awesome ClojureScript / JavaScript Interoperability

  • Jayq (⭐412) – A ClojureScript wrapper for jQuery.

entry.title: Awesome Clojurescript Updates on May 20, 2015
entry.content:
Awesome ClojureScript / Web Framework & Template

  • Mies (⭐366) – A minimal ClojureScript project template.

entry.title: Awesome Clojurescript Updates on May 18, 2015
entry.content:
Awesome ClojureScript / JavaScript Interoperability

  • CLJSJS – An easy way for Clojurescript developers to depend on Javascript libraries.

Awesome ClojureScript / Miscellaneous

  • Automat (⭐590) – A Clojure(Script) library for defining and using finite-state automata, inspired by Ragel.
  • core.async (⭐2k) – A Clojure(Script) library designed to provide facilities for async programming and communication.

entry.title: Awesome Clojurescript Updates on May 13, 2015
entry.content:
Awesome ClojureScript / Validation

  • Validateur – A Clojure validation library inspired by Ruby's ActiveModel.

entry.title: Awesome Clojurescript Updates on May 04, 2015
entry.content:
Awesome ClojureScript / Testing

  • Speclj (⭐469) – A TDD/BDD framework for Clojure and ClojureScript.

entry.title: Awesome Clojurescript Updates on May 03, 2015
entry.content:
Awesome ClojureScript / Web Framework & Template

  • atw-om (⭐41) – A web application template with Clojure/Compojure, ClojureScript/Om & core.async.
  • Hoplon – Write everything in Clojure and ClojureScript, clientside and serverside.
  • Luminus – It aims to provide a robust, scalable, and easy to use platform.
  • re-frame (⭐5.5k) – A Reagent Framework For Writing SPAs, in Clojurescript.

entry.title: Awesome Clojurescript Updates on Apr 27, 2015
entry.content:
Awesome ClojureScript / Canvas

  • Monet (⭐167) – A small ClojureScript library to make it easier to work with canvas and visuals.

Awesome ClojureScript / Data Visualization

  • C2 – It lets you declaratively create HTML and SVG markup based on data.

Awesome ClojureScript / Database

  • Datascript (⭐5.6k) – An immutable in-memory database and Datalog query engine in ClojureScript.
  • Jaki (⭐16) – A simple ClojureScript CouchDB client.

Awesome ClojureScript / Document Object Model

  • cljs-binding (⭐57) – It binds html elements to ClojureScript functions.
  • Hiccups (⭐215) – A ClojureScript port of the Hiccup.
  • Hickory (⭐660) – It parses HTML into Clojure data structures, so you can analyze, transform, and output back to HTML.

Awesome ClojureScript / Internationalization

  • Tower (⭐278) – A Clojure(Script) i18n & L10n library.

Awesome ClojureScript / JavaScript Interoperability

  • Pylon (⭐54) – A Javascript class system in 100% Clojurescript.

Awesome ClojureScript / Miscellaneous

  • inflections-clj (⭐221) – Rails-like inflection library for Clojure and ClojureScript.

Awesome ClojureScript / Routing

  • Silk (⭐224) – An isomorphic routing library for Clojure & ClojureScript.

Awesome ClojureScript / State Management

  • Waltz (⭐90) – A ClojureScript library that helps manage state in client-side applications using non-deterministic finite state machines.

Awesome ClojureScript / Testing

  • Expectations – A minimalist's unit testing framework.

Awesome ClojureScript / Validation

  • Bouncer (⭐364) – A validation DSL for Clojure & Clojurescript applications.
